name: Chloe's Requiem
storyline: Michel D'Alembert is a twelve-year-old violinist who is extremely talented, but hates training and is very lazy. One day, he runs away from his family and ends up in a strange mansion. There, he meets a young girl named Cloé, who tells him that she has a curse, and tasks him with repelling it.
summary: Chloe's Requiem is an indie horror adventure game. Solve the puzzles that are assigned to Michel in order to slowly break the curse of the mansion. There's also a sanity meter that will get affected if Michel sees something traumatic.
